cities.name: Kyoto
cities.description: Kyoto, the cultural heart of Japan, offers stunning temples, traditional gardens, and geisha districts. A must-see for history lovers.

cities.name: Tokyo
cities.description: Tokyo is a dynamic mix of ultra-modern and traditional, from neon-lit skyscrapers to historic temples. A hub for technology and fashion.

cities.name: Rio de Janeiro
cities.description: Famous for its stunning beaches like Copacabana and Ipanema, the colossal Christ the Redeemer statue, and vibrant Carnival.

cities.name: Salvador
cities.description: Salvador is a city rich in Afro-Brazilian culture, history, and beautiful colonial architecture in the Pelourinho district.

temples.name: Angkor Wat
temples.description: The largest religious monument in the world, a stunning testament to the Khmer Empire's architectural genius in Cambodia.

temples.name: Borobudur
temples.description: A 9th-century Mahayana Buddhist Temple in Central Java, Indonesia, famous for its intricate stone carvings and peaceful stupas.

beaches.name: Whitehaven Beach
beaches.description: Located in the Whitsunday Islands, Australia, known for its pure white silica sand and turquoise waters.

beaches.name: Malibu Beach
beaches.description: A classic Southern California beach, popular for surfing, sunbathing, and its iconic pier in the USA.
